pages.text: $(li)The Woodcutter is a new block that adds more efficient recipes for crafing Wood items.
$(li)If this block is placed near of a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a Lumberjack.
$(li)Just insert the Wood Planks or Wood Log that you want to transform, select the block that do you want and save it in your inventory.
$(li)The Sawmill is a other good block that adds more efficient recipes for crafing Wood items.
$(li)If this block is placed near of a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a Carpenter.
$(li)Just insert the Wood Planks or Wood Log that you want to transform, select the block that do you want and save it in your inventory.
